EV isolated method: Vesicles were also isolated from PBMCs and opsonized C. albicans-infected PBMCs using size exclusion chromatography with Sepharose CL-2B (Sigma-Aldrich) according to Böing et al. (64). In total, 15 1-mL fractions were collected from chromatography and subjected to vesicle detection. EVs were used immediately or stored at –20°C. For subsequent use, frozen EVs were thawed slowly on ice.
Project_Title: RNA sequencing of early extracellular vesicles derived from human monocytes in presence of C. albicans (human)
Project_Description:
75 high abudance human miRNA were found to be transported by extracellular vesicles from human monocytes in presence of C. albicans
Overall design: Blood derived monocytes were incubated with C. albcians for 1 h, followed by isolation of extracellular vesicle and the cargo RNA. RNA from 8 donors were combined and sequenced

EV isolated method: Vesicles were also isolated from PBMCs and opsonized C. albicans-infected PBMCs using size exclusion chromatography with Sepharose CL-2B (Sigma-Aldrich) according to Böing et al. (64). In total, 15 1-mL fractions were collected from chromatography and subjected to vesicle detection. EVs were used immediately or stored at –20°C. For subsequent use, frozen EVs were thawed slowly on ice.
